entries.title: Factorio is getting a price increase in response to inflation
entries.description: The excellent factory-building game will see a rare post-launch price bump soon.

entries.title: Wait, again? War Thunder fans just can't help themselves when it comes to posting sensitive military documents
entries.description: It had been less than *two days* since the last time this happened.

entries.title: GOG is giving away this lovely little island adventure game for free
entries.description: Haven Park is bursting with charm as you fix up an island to attract adorable animal tourists.

entries.title: I finally bought the massive 4K OLED gaming monitor I’ve been fiending for, and I couldn't be happier
entries.description: Self-care is buying a comically large display to watch anime and play XCOM 2 on.

entries.title: The Last of Us co-creator 'isn’t getting a credit or a nickel' from the HBO show
entries.description: Bruce Straley co-created The Last of Us with Neil Druckmann, but you wouldn't know it from the TV show credits.

entries.title: 5 reasons my hopes are high for Amazon's Fallout TV series
entries.description: Despite knowing almost nothing about it, I'm finding it hard not to get excited for the Fallout TV series. War never changes… the channel.

entries.title: Sea of Thieves greets 2023 with a new, limited-time adventure and shorter PvP queues
entries.description: Rare's pirate sim continues to be an enticing hangout destination.

entries.title: Inkbound, the action RPG from the makers of Monster Train, is having an open playtest this weekend
entries.description: The new game from Shiny Shoe looks very promising, and you don't have to take my word for it.

entries.title: To make an AI chat bot behave, Kenyan workers say they were 'mentally scarred' by graphic text
entries.description: Workers were hired to label offensive text snippets for OpenAI and ChatGPT, according to a Time report.

entries.title: Psyonix unleashes 'banwave' against the Rocket League bot menace
entries.description: In late 2022 bots began infesting competitive play, but now the studio reckons it has the solution.

entries.title: Cozy city builders are finally letting me design pretty places in peace
entries.description: Sometimes I just want to thrive and vibe without the demand to survive.

entries.title: After 14 years, Risen is back—I decided to find out why
entries.description: The re-release adds Steam Deck and gamepad support—and it's surprisingly revealing about how THQ Nordic sees its older games.

entries.title: The Bored Apes NFT game is literally about chasing shit
entries.description: Dookey Dash is the first Bored Apes Yacht Club game, and people are paying big bucks to get in.

entries.title: Disney is bringing Tron back from the dead, with Jared Leto starring
entries.description: Tron: Ares is currently in early talks, but it's not the only Tron thing happening this year.

entries.title: Already-massive Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous adds new class, quests, companion
entries.description: A presumably-angry shapeshifting viking man and more are coming March 7.

entries.title: You can now download the source code for Apple's most influential failure
entries.description: Celebrate forty years of the Lisa's influential graphical interface.

entries.title: Lee Harvey Oswald loves Morrowind and other things we learned talking to AI historical figures
entries.description: We interviewed historical figures about videogames using this AI chat app.

entries.title: I lost my head and lubed a mechanical keyboard switch. Help
entries.description: Asus made me do it, though now I need never do it again.

entries.title: Midnight Suns' Deadpool trailer has vampires, wizardly cosmetics, and an imminent release date
entries.description: Consider the fourth wall demolished.

entries.title: Ten tips for Slugcat survival in Rain World: Downpour
entries.description: Outsmart your post-apocalyptic predators.

entries.title: Most MSI motherboards will allow any code to run in a bizarrely insecure Secure Boot mode
entries.description: But the feature still works if you set the BIOS correctly.

entries.title: Google lays off 12,000 blaming 'different economic reality' as mass tech layoffs continue
entries.description: Google's parent company Alphabet lays off thousands of people from across organisation.

entries.title: The Callisto Protocol adds NG+ and makes you immune while vaulting
entries.description: And Jacob should no longer glitch out into space, which is nice.

entries.title: How the Trading Post works in World of Warcraft
entries.description: Pick up older and paid cosmetics for free.

entries.title: Ubisoft CEO apologises for placing his foot so deeply into his mouth
entries.description: Whatever Yves said, whatever Yves did, he didn't mean it.

entries.title: NetEase smashes up World of Warcraft statue after its nasty breakup with Blizzard
entries.description: The Chinese publisher's staff went on a raid.

entries.title: Against this Borg Cube PC, resistance is futile
entries.description: "You can't begin to imagine the life you denied yourself" without an officially licensed Star Trek Borg Cube PC in your possession.

entries.title: Keke Palmer just became the most relatable Sims 4 player of all time
entries.description: She's just like me for real.

entries.title: All Paper Theater solutions in the Genshin Impact Lantern Rite event
entries.description: Put on paper plays and complete each scene.

entries.title: The reality of gaming in Iran: "We are fighting against censorship to be able to play"
entries.description: Amidst protests, internet suppression, and government crackdowns, a gaming culture provides an escape

entries.title: ASRock heard you like AMD X670 mobos, so it turned a B650 into an X670 with an add-in card
entries.description: Characteristically quirky from ASRock, but you wouldn't, really.

entries.title: Sapphire Nitro+ RX 7900 XTX Vapor-X
entries.description: The Radeon RX 7900 XTX unleashed.

entries.title: The best way to play the Persona games
entries.description: With the modern trilogy on PC, here's the best place to start.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 580 answer and hint for Friday, January 20
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #580 puzzle.

entries.title: Game that promised no paid DLC ever is getting paid DLC: 'We need a way to continue to fund the development'
entries.description: Not even Squad is immune to monetization, it turns out.

entries.title: This new 'turn-based city builder' challenges you to terraform and colonize Mars
entries.description: Melt ice, topple mountains, and mine resources to create a sustainable colony on the Red Planet.

entries.title: Obsidian was in talks to make an Avatar game, says studio boss
entries.description: Feargus Urquhart's recent interview with GamePressure trawls some deep Obsidian lore.
